DOC.brief_summary: Cryo AF Global Registry prospective , global , multi-center , observational Post-Market Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The Cryo AF Global Registry prospective , global , multi-center , observational post-market registry ( PMR ) . The purpose study evaluate describe clinical performance safety data broad patient population treat commercially available Arctic Front™ Family Cardiac Cryoablation Catheters ( hereafter refer `` Arctic Front™ Cardiac Cryoablation Catheter System '' ) . The cryoballoon ablation ( CBA ) procedure perform accord routine hospital practice . The study expect 24 month enrollment period . The follow period intend align standard practice subject follow minimum 12 month post-procedure .
DOC.criteria: Subject ≥ 18 year age minimum age require local regulation Planned procedure use commercially available Arctic Front™ Cardiac Cryoablation Catheter Willing comply study requirement give inform consent ( define legally effective , documented confirmation subject 's voluntary agreement participate clinical study ) authorization per institution geographical requirement Subject enrol concurrent study approve concurrent enrollment global study manager Subject exclusion criterion require local law
